title: Roland Huntford, Lore-Debunking Historian of Polar Exploration, Dies at 98
summary_full: He caused an uproar by challenging the heroic status of Robert Falcon Scott, the Briton who led a doomed quest to the South Pole in 1912.
summary_public: He caused an uproar by challenging the heroic status of Robert Falcon Scott, the Briton who led a doomed quest to the South Pole in 1912.
